title: This works underwater! - Tribit StormBox Micro
description: Thanks, Tribit for sponsoring today's video! Enter to win a Tribit StormBox Micro Bluetooth speaker at   Bluetooth speakers aren't exactly new, but having one that can work underwater can be a fun party trick!  20% OFF Code: MICROSCT1   US: $34.99  CA:  $55.99  Tribit Official:    15% OFF EU Code: MICROSCT2 UK: 33.99   DE: 39.09    FR: 39.09   IT:  39.09   ES: 39.09   Valid Time:  09/07/2020 7:00 AM PDT - 09/13/202011:59 PM PDT    Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.
